alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 02 at 3:58PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM MONDAY TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches on the valley floor and locally up to 20 inches on the benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Salt Lake Valley and Utah Valley. * WHEN...From 3 AM Monday to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Utah Valley
